trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around July 17th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailson that night, I came out side to look around before bed as I always do. I always look at the sky for a while . as I was looking up a brite yellow to white orb came out of nowhere right above me moving fron east to west. the sky was crystal clear and there were no lights around, you can really see the stars from here. There were a few very small high level clouds in the sky, I new they were high up because they seemed small compared to the stars. by the way there is o air traffic around here. The orb moved in a easterly direction as I watched. It approach one of these little clouds, past it by what looked like an inch from the ground, and the abruptly turned in a hair pin like move incapable by any aircraft, and went inside this small cloud, and was gone I watched it for a long time asttonished at what I had seen.. Several months before I had seen one of the same objects shooting across the sky from se to ne, and on the forth of july 2008 saw one as well but it was huge.
Summary: looked up as often do and saw a ufo
